items.title: Trump flirts with exempting Hungary’s Orban from Russia oil sanctions
items.description: Hungary has remained a defiant outlier as much of Europe has stopped purchasing Russian oil since its 2022 full-scale invasion of Ukraine.

items.title: How a backlash to Trump fueled Democratic gains with Latino voters
items.description: The president’s deportation policies, along with high prices and changes in who turned out to vote propelled a shift in this year’s election.
